entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
